automake
bash
bear              # database generator for clang
bind-utils        # DNS cli tools
clang
clang-tools-extra # provides clangd
cmake
coreutils
ctags
curl
diffutils
docker-ce
dos2unix
duf               # modern version of df
etckeeper         # /etc as a git repo
file
gcc
gcc-c++
git
git-extras
gzip
htop
iftop
inotify-tools
iotop
irqbalance
jc                # convert text output from common tools to JSON
jo                # command-line JSON object creation
jq
jwhois
liburing-devel    # contains man pages for io_uring
libyaml
libyaml-devel
litecli           # nicer SQLite CLI
lnav              # log file navigator
lsd               # modern ls replacement
lshw
lsof
man-db
mkpasswd
moreutils
musl-gcc
mycli             # nicer MySQL CLI
net-tools         # netstat
nmap
nmap-ncat
openssl-devel
openssl-libs
pandoc
patch
pcre
pcre-devel
pcre2
pgcli             # nicer Postgres CLI
plocate
pre-commit        # fancy git pre-commit framework
psutils
readline-devel
rpmconf           # handles .rpmnew files after upgrading packages
rsync
scdoc             # man-page/doc generator
sd                # find+replace (simpler, faster sed)
sed
sqlite
sqlite-devel
smartmontools
strace
sysstat
taglib
tcpdump
telnet
tmux
traceroute
tree
unzip
util-linux
valgrind
valgrind-devel
vim-common
wabt              # WebAssembly Binary Toolkit: https://github.com/WebAssembly/wabt

xdg-user-dirs
xdg-utils
zip

zlib-devel
